comment.author: 72133717@N05
comment._content: John Vivian Nancarrow died 25 April 1915 age 30. Son of George Bennett & Charlotte Alice Nancarrow of Ravenscroft, Grove Hill, Middlesborough - Comemorated Panel 33 on the Ypres (Menin Gate) Memorial. Information from www.cwgc.org There is a charitable fund named after him recorded on The Charities Aid Foundation website called The Captain John Vivian Nancarrow Fund Reg. No. 506937. A short biography of his life can be found at:- www.ww1-yorkshires.org.uk/pdf-files/bob%20coulson/mbro-wa...
